0100100011110000 1110110100001111 1 -> sum: 0011011000000000, cout: 1
0111010101000000 0001001100111101 0 -> sum: 1000100001111101, cout: 0
0110001000101001 0001111100000001 1 -> sum: 1000000100101011, cout: 0
0101111000010001 1011011011111011 0 -> sum: 0001010100001100, cout: 1
0010011100011000 0011010111011000 1 -> sum: 0101110011110001, cout: 0
1110010010110010 0110100001011100 0 -> sum: 0100110100001110, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
